New Records: Nortje records the most economical four-over spell by a pacer in T20 World Cup (4-0-8-4).
Nortje also joins Shakib Al Hasan and Saeed Ajmal for the joint-most four-wicket hauls in T20 WCs.
Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje's 4/8 bundled Sri Lanka for 77.
South Africa recorded a scrappy six-wicket win with eight wickets and under four overs to spare.
Quinton de Kock c Asalanka b Hasaranga 20 (27b 1x6)
Tristan Stubbs c Asalanka b Hasaranga 13 (28b)
David Miller drills it past long-on for FOUR and record a six-wicket win.
Aiden Markram c PHKD Mendis b Shanaka 12 (14b 1x6)
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka win toss, opt to bat
Hasaranga: We're going to bat first. We can see it's a good wicket. Just want to get a good score. Our bowling attack is so strong, that's our idea.

Markram: Markram: We actually would've bowled. Not sure how the wicket is going to play. Team has been together now for few years - majority of the squad. Did well at the ODI World Cup, ideally would've liked to go a few steps further.
The teams have also been offered an alternate training venue due to the soft outfield.
Heinrich Klaasen has not been in the best of nicks lately but he is arguably the most feared hitter in the T20 game today.
Tristan Stubbs, who has had an excellent IPL season with the Delhi Capitals will be the key player for South Africa.
Sri Lanka captain Wanindu Hasaranga will be in the spotlight.
Post-Match Reflections: Aiden Markram expressed satisfaction with the win, acknowledging the batting challenges and the importance of adapting to different conditions.
Wanindu Hasaranga highlighted the bowling effort and the need for improvement in the batting department.
Anrich Nortje expressed happiness with his performance and the impact on the team's momentum.
Marco Jansen to Nissanka, OUT! Full delivery outside the off-stump and Nissanka's rash swipe across the line clips the outside-edge and flies straight to the third fielder.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nuwan Thushara is the last man in.
Dasun Shanaka c Markram b Rabada 9 (10b 1x6)
Kamindu Mendis c Hendricks b Nortje 11 (15b 1x4)
Kusal Mendis c Klaasen b Hasaranga 0 (2b 0x4); Sadeera Samarawickrama b Maharaj 0 (1b)
Others: The outfield at the venue has come under the scanner for its softness.
There is a 40% chance of rainfall on the match day.
Temperatures are expected to hover around 28 degrees Celsius.
